projects.title: Open edX Theme & Dashboard Customization
projects.shortDescription: Customized LMS dashboards, added new theme pages, and implemented modern UI components for enhanced user experience.
projects.description: Comprehensive customization of Open edX Learning Management System including dashboard redesign, new page implementations, and modern UI component development.
projects.problem: The default Open edX interface needed significant customization to match institutional branding and provide a more intuitive user experience. Students and instructors required a more modern, accessible dashboard with better course navigation and information architecture.
contributions: Redesigned student and instructor dashboards with modern, card-based layouts
Implemented custom theme pages using Mako/Jinja templates with Tailwind CSS
Developed reusable UI components for course cards, progress indicators, and navigation elements
Integrated responsive design patterns ensuring mobile-first accessibility
Customized Studio interface for improved content authoring experience
outcomes: Improved user engagement with 40% more intuitive navigation
Reduced support tickets related to UI confusion by 35%
Successfully deployed across multiple Open edX releases (Koa through Sumac)
Enhanced mobile user experience with fully responsive layouts

projects.title: Ecommerce & Payment Integration (Cashfree)
projects.shortDescription: Enabled ecommerce functionality with Cashfree payment gateway integration, coupon system, and course access restrictions.
projects.description: Complete ecommerce solution implementation for Open edX platform including payment gateway integration, order management, and course enrollment automation.
projects.problem: The platform needed a reliable payment solution to monetize courses while maintaining seamless user experience. Required integration with Cashfree payment gateway, implementation of promotional coupon system, and automated course access management based on payment status.
contributions: Integrated Cashfree payment gateway with Open edX ecommerce service
Developed coupon and discount code management system with validation logic
Implemented automated order processing and fulfillment workflows
Created course access restriction system based on payment verification
Built admin interface for payment tracking and order management
Implemented webhook handlers for real-time payment status updates
outcomes: Successfully processed 10,000+ transactions with 99.9% success rate
Reduced payment processing time from 5 minutes to under 30 seconds
Implemented secure PCI-compliant payment handling
Enabled revenue generation through course monetization platform

projects.title: Custom Reports & Certificates
projects.shortDescription: Developed automated Excel report generation for student analytics and custom certificate issuance system.
projects.description: Built comprehensive reporting and certification system for educational analytics and student achievement recognition.
projects.problem: Administrators needed efficient ways to extract and analyze student data across multiple dimensions. Manual report generation was time-consuming and error-prone. Certificate generation process required automation to scale with growing student enrollment.
contributions: Developed automated Excel report generation system for student enrollment, progress, and completion data
Implemented custom certificate generation with dynamic fields and branding
Created scheduled report delivery system via email
Built admin dashboard for report configuration and certificate template management
Optimized database queries for large dataset exports (100,000+ student records)
outcomes: Reduced report generation time from hours to minutes
Automated certificate delivery for 50,000+ students
Enabled data-driven decision making for institutional leadership
Created 20+ customizable report templates for different stakeholder needs

projects.title: Authn & MFE Backend Work
projects.shortDescription: Backend development for Authentication, Account, and Learning microfrontends with customized field support.
projects.description: Backend API development and customization for Open edX microfrontend architecture supporting modern React-based user interfaces.
projects.problem: Open edX microfrontend architecture required robust backend APIs to support new React-based interfaces. Custom fields and institutional-specific requirements needed backend support while maintaining upgrade compatibility across Open edX releases.
contributions: Developed REST APIs for Authentication microfrontend with custom field support
Implemented Account Management backend for profile customization
Built Learning MFE backend endpoints for course delivery and progress tracking
Created custom serializers and validators for extended user profile data
Integrated third-party authentication providers (OAuth, SAML)
Implemented API versioning and backward compatibility layers
outcomes: Successfully migrated 30,000+ users to new microfrontend architecture
Reduced page load times by 60% compared to legacy Django templates
Maintained 99.99% API uptime during migration period
Enabled seamless upgrade path across Open edX releases (Palm to Sumac)

projects.title: Platform Integration: Open edX ↔ Odoo
projects.shortDescription: Built bidirectional API integration and data synchronization between Open edX and Odoo ERP systems.
projects.description: Developed comprehensive integration solution connecting Open edX learning platform with Odoo ERP for unified student and business management.
projects.problem: Institution required seamless data flow between learning management (Open edX) and business operations (Odoo). Manual data entry between systems was error-prone and inefficient. Real-time synchronization needed for student enrollments, payments, and HR management.
contributions: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for bidirectional data sync
Built student enrollment automation from Odoo to Open edX
Developed real-time payment reconciliation between platforms
Implemented HR data synchronization for instructor profiles
Created error handling and retry mechanisms for failed sync operations
Built monitoring dashboard for integration health and data consistency checks
outcomes: Automated 95% of manual data entry tasks between systems
Synchronized 25,000+ student records with 99.8% accuracy
Reduced enrollment processing time from 24 hours to real-time
Eliminated data inconsistencies between learning and business operations

projects.title: Mobile Plugin Exploration
projects.shortDescription: Explored and integrated custom Android plugin for enhanced native mobile learning experience.
projects.description: Research and implementation of custom Android plugin to extend Open edX mobile app functionality with native features.
projects.problem: Standard Open edX mobile app lacked certain native capabilities required for enhanced learning experience. Needed to explore plugin architecture and implement custom features while maintaining compatibility with Open edX mobile app updates.
contributions: Researched Open edX mobile plugin architecture and integration patterns
Developed custom Android plugin for offline content synchronization
Implemented native push notification handling for course updates
Created documentation for plugin development and deployment process
Tested plugin compatibility across Android versions (8.0 - 14.0)
outcomes: Successfully integrated custom plugin with Open edX mobile app
Enabled offline learning for 5,000+ mobile users
Improved mobile app engagement by 45%
Created reusable plugin framework for future mobile enhancements

timeline.title: Software Engineer
timeline.description: Promoted to full-time Software Engineer role, leading Open edX platform customization and integration projects.
